name: Deadly Maze (itch) (Jubileus Deus)
description:
This game has been made during the Kenney's 2022 game jam.

This is a game where the player have to reach a certain point in a maze. The closer he is from the point, the bigger the character grows. After a certain point the character starts to flash : if the player doesn't reach the point of the maze rapidly, the player just dies.

Controls :

  • WASD/ZQSD to move the player
  • SPACE to Jump
  • Gamepad support
